original_text: If people like that receive a bribe, they will not say that wicked people are guilty. They also refuse to say that righteous people are not guilty.
korean_text: 그들은 뇌물로 말미암아 악인을 의롭다 하고 의인에게서 그 공의를 빼앗는도다

sentences.original_text: If people like that receive a bribe
they will not say that wicked people are guilty
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 악한 사람들이 유죄라고 말하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that righteous people are not guilty
